posts.title: Manatee Tea Infuser
posts.content: Enjoy the company of Florida’s most lovable sea cow the next time you use the manatee tea infuser to prepare your favorite hot beverage. This gentle giant keeps you company as he hangs out of your tea cup while simultaneously using his ample body to infuse your drink.

posts.title: Touch Free Water Faucet Adapter
posts.content: Help prevent the spread of germs in your home by installing the touch free water faucet adapter. The touch free design allows you to turn on the faucet simply by placing your hands under the sensors – which works perfectly for washing dishes and doing other chores.

posts.title: Shiatsu Pillow Massager
posts.content: Make your daily commute a bit more bearable by giving yourself a luxury shiatsu massage while stuck in soul crushing bumper to bumper traffic! This shiatsu pillow massager is equipped with powerful 3D deep kneading massage nodes that perfectly contour to your body.

posts.title: Pop-Up Dinosaur Encyclopedia
posts.content: Make science come to life for your paleontologists-in-training with this pop-up dinosaur encyclopedia. This one of a kind read comes packed with fascinating facts and lighthearted humor along with incredibly detailed dinosaurs that pop out as you turn the pages.

posts.title: Face Down Beach Lounger
posts.content: Work on your backside tan without having to strain your neck by laying out on this face down beach lounger. The ergonomically designed cushion cradles your face so you can comfortably lie face-down and be able to read a good book.

posts.title: Hundred Dollar Bill Tissues
posts.content: Flaunt your extravagant wealth as you blow your nose using the hundred dollar bill tissues. These soft, quality napkins feature a realistic hundred dollar bill design so you can convincingly create the illusion you’re literally throwing away money like paper.

posts.title: Lace Your Face Facial Mask
posts.content: Keep your skin looking young and radiant by pampering yourself using these natural stretch cotton lace facial masks. Apart from looking fabulous, they provide a combination of anti-aging hydrolyzed collagen and hyaluronic acid to improve your overall skin radiance.

posts.title: Super Mario Amiibo Display Stand
posts.content: Give your game room some old school flair by decorating it with this Super Mario Amiibo display stand. Modeled like the iconic Super Mario Bros. finish line, the stand is 15 inches tall and features enough room to display up to 6 Amiibo figurines.

posts.title: Teddy Bear Lamp
posts.content: The Teddy bear lamp is the ideal lighting fixture for any baby or kid’s nursery. The decapitated Teddy connects via USB with plug adapters and gives off a soft warm glow that won’t overpower the room or wake up your precious bundle of joy as she slumbers.

posts.title: Extreme Heat Resistant Gloves
posts.content: Avoid a trip to the emergency room when working with fire by wearing these extreme heat resistant gloves. They provide a flexible and comfy fit and are designed to withstand temperatures of up to 932 degrees Fahrenheit.

posts.title: Body Part Gummies
posts.content: Feed your cannibalistic urges without going full out Hannibal Lecter by snacking on some body part gummies. These gluten and fat free treats come in a giant two pound bag and include everything from fingers to delicious braaaaaaiiinssss.

posts.title: Slide To Unlock Doormat
posts.content: This geeky doormat is a clever tribute to the widely used “slide to unlock” security feature on smart phones. The slide to unlock doormat is made of rubber and measures roughly 2’x1′ making it ideal for dorms and small living spaces.
